title: Multi-Domain Optical Network Collaborative Fault Management: Self-Directed and Federated Learning Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practice-focused education using smartphone-based VR/simulation tools with multi-domain optical network scenarios mirroring real industrial settings

learning_goals: Design and implement a self-supervised learning model that detects soft failures in multi-domain optical networks with over 95% accuracy.
Build a collaborative fault management system ensuring cross-domain data privacy using federated learning frameworks.
Provide data-driven solutions combining clustering and uncertainty analysis to identify abnormal patterns and visualize fault locations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
